bill_title: make an appropriation to the State Conservation Commission and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation to the State Conservation Commission and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the coordinated natural resources conservation fund the sum of $1,000,000, to the State Conservation Commission, for the purpose of implementing the South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation. Section 2. The State Conservation Commission shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
